comments:
Build: I20070501-0010

1) Capture sleak snapshot
2) Ctrl+3, "nut" (new untitled text file)
3) Close the resulting editor
4) Capture sleak diff

-> A cursor is leaked each time I follow these steps.  I could not reproduce by opening the wizard through the normal wizard dialog, so perhaps this is a strange quirk of quick access.
